acqinfo.p: This collection was given to the University of Virginia Library by Elizabeth Easton, Sherman, Connecticut, on March 11, 1997.

scopecontent.head: Scope and Content Information
scopecontent.p: This collection consists of letters, chiefly conveying personal news and comments on contemporary work, Christmas cards, birthday cards & other greetings from Warren Chappell to Lillian Bragdon and her daughter, Elizabeth Easton, most containing original artwork by Chappell. Other items include: an original pencil and charcoal sketch, with the words "Welcome to Chilmark"; a movable paper "game" board hand-drawn by Warren Chappell; a printed copy of Borzoi Battledore(1945 May) and a cover mock-up for Borzoi Books For Children designed by Warren Chappell.
